entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: SSW 30 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers or drizzle late in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along the coast in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3 except minus 7 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 3 except minus 7 in low lying inland areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
